# `TimeSlot` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startTime | `string` | No | start time in xx:xx:xx.xxx format |
| stopTime | `string` | No | stop time in xx:xx:xx.xxx format |
| day | `number` | No | Day for this time slot, Monday = 1 ... Sunday = 7 |
